RoomAdditionalInfo.Description:
Soundproofed room


Internet - Free WiFi and wired Internet access

Entertainment - 32-inch TV, satellite channels, and DVD player

Food and Drink - Mini-fridge, minibar, 24-hour room service, and free bottled water

Sleep - Pillowtop bed, a down duvet, blackout drapes/curtains, and bed sheets

Bathroom - Bathrobes, a hair dryer, and a bidet

Practical - Safe, iron/ironing board, and desk

Comfort - Daily housekeeping and climate-controlled heating and air conditioning

Accessibility - Wheelchair accessible, raised toilet seat, grab bar near toilet, and lever door handles

Smoking And Non-Smoking

Connecting/adjoining rooms can be requested, subject to availability

Soundproofed room


Layout - Bedroom

Internet - Free WiFi and wired Internet access

Entertainment - 32-inch TV, satellite channels, and DVD player

Food and Drink - Mini-fridge, minibar, 24-hour room service, and free bottled water

Sleep - Pillowtop bed, a down duvet, blackout drapes/curtains, and bed sheets

Bathroom - Bathrobes, a hair dryer, and a bidet

Practical - Safe, iron/ironing board, and desk

Comfort - Daily housekeeping and climate-controlled heating and air conditioning

Accessibility - Wheelchair accessible, raised toilet seat, grab bar near toilet, and lever door handles

Need to Know - No rollaway/extra beds available

Smoking And Non-Smoking

Connecting/adjoining rooms can be requested, subject to availability
